com.storytron.uber

Class Role.Option

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.storytron.uber.Role.Option
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
    Enclosing class:
    Role

    public static final class Role.Option
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable, java.io.Serializable
    An Option describe a possible reaction for an Actor assuming a given Role. Its main attribute is the verb that is evaluated as a possible reaction (getPointedVerb()).

    The Option has an Inclination Script that tells how inclined is the actor towards the option.

    The Option holds a Role.Option.OptionWordSocket collection that determines how to fill the verb components to form a Sentence. Manipulable through getWordSocket(int), getWordSocket(String), setWordSocket(int, com.storytron.uber.Role.Option.OptionWordSocket), #initWordSocket(int), isWordSocketActive(int).

    See Also:
